name: Blobville
description:
Blobville is a game about saving a near extinct tribe of Blobs called the Cyblobs. 
Satisfy their needs to keep them happy and watch the village grow.

~ Controls ~
Mouse to select items, drop them and advance text
Keyboard 1, 2 and 3 to select items

~ Special thanks to ~
My amazing testers Mör, Dani and Danny

**~ Tools used ~**  
Unity, Visual Studio, GIMP, Audacity, FL Studio (VSTs: SpicyGuitar, DSK Overture), jfxr

Created within 48h for Ludum Dare 40, (Theme: The more you have, the worse it is)
